product_summary:
**Summary (100 words):** 

Itair is a software product designed to help sales teams manage their pipelines, track customer relationships, and close deals. It offers a range of features including contact management, lead scoring, opportunity tracking, and reporting. Itair integrates with a number of other business applications, making it a valuable tool for sales teams of all sizes. The software is cloud-based, so it can be accessed from anywhere with an internet connection.
product_cons: Not as customizable as some other CRM systems

product_usecases.details: Itair can help sales teams manage their pipelines by providing a clear view of all active deals. The software allows users to track the progress of each deal, identify potential roadblocks, and forecast revenue.

Itair's CRM capabilities allow sales teams to track all of their interactions with customers. The software stores customer contact information, notes, and activity history. This information can be used to build stronger relationships with customers and close more deals.

Itair's lead scoring feature helps sales teams identify the most promising leads. The software uses a variety of factors to score leads, such as company size, industry, and job title. This information can help sales teams prioritize their efforts and focus on the leads that are most likely to convert into customers.

Itair allows sales teams to track the progress of each opportunity. The software provides a clear view of the sales process, from initial contact to close. This information can help sales teams identify potential problems and take corrective action.

Itair offers a variety of reports that can help sales teams track their progress and identify areas for improvement. The software provides reports on sales activity, pipeline performance, and customer satisfaction.

product_toolfor.details: Itair is designed to help sales teams of all sizes manage their pipelines, track customer relationships, and close deals.
Itair is an affordable and easy-to-use CRM solution that is ideal for small businesses.
Itair's cloud-based platform and affordable pricing make it a great option for startups.
Itair can help entrepreneurs manage their sales pipelines and track customer relationships.
Itair is a great way for freelancers to manage their sales and marketing activities.

product_pricing: Itair offers a variety of pricing plans to fit the needs of businesses of all sizes. The Basic plan starts at $29 per month and includes all of the core features. The Professional plan starts at $49 per month and includes additional features such as lead scoring and opportunity tracking. The Enterprise plan starts at $99 per month and includes all of the features of the Professional plan plus additional features such as custom reporting and advanced security.
